name: Weird Game (Jajoo)
description:
================  Announcement  ========================

Hi.

It's Jajoo, of course.

This game is bad, but you may see that i am learning new things!

please help me learn if you can, and if you know any good + simple to use game engines please inform me!

i will mention you in a game i make with it if you will, hopefully.

Anyway, onto the real description i wrote before.

=====================================================

Little game I made in CopperCube. I'm still new to this software, but don't expect frequent updates.

Oh yeah, maybe I will do some of your suggestions, as long as they will help the game.

(p.s. i dont know how to change the player speed so sorry if you get motionsick)
